cause.description:
This cause will benifit not only Jamie, but you to, because whenever you want to go to disneyland, Jamie can go with you (an nobody wants to be alone at disneyland!)
1. Disneyland IS the happiest place on earth (besides disneyworld)
cause.mission: get Jamie a season pass so she can go whenever she wants
cause.name: Jamie Wants a Season Pass to Disneyland!
